## Variables

| Variable                                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [compilerMetadata](./react.compilermetadata.md)       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [ConnectWallet](./react.connectwallet.md)             | <p>**<i>(BETA)</i>** A component that allows the user to connect their wallet.</p><p>The button has to be wrapped in a <code>Web3sdksProvider</code> in order to function.</p>                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [contractType](./react.contracttype.md)               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [MediaRenderer](./react.mediarenderer.md)             | <p>This component can be used to render any media type, including image, audio, video, and html files. Its convenient for rendering NFT media files, as these can be a variety of different types. The component falls back to a external link if the media type is not supported.</p><p>Props: [MediaRendererProps](./react.mediarendererprops.md)</p> |
| [Web3sdksNftMedia](./react.web3sdksnftmedia.md)       | This component can be used to render NFTs from the web3sdks SDK. Props: [Web3sdksNftMediaProps](./react.web3sdksnftmediaprops.md)                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Web3sdksProvider](./react.web3sdksprovider.md)       | The <code>&lt;Web3sdksProvider /&gt;</code> component lets you control what networks you want users to connect to, what types of wallets can connect to your app, and the settings for the \[Typescript SDK\](https://docs.web3sdks.com/typescript).                                                                                                    |
| [Web3sdksSDKProvider](./react.web3sdkssdkprovider.md) | <p>A basic wrapper around the Web3sdks SDK.</p><p>You can use this in order to be able to pass a provider &amp; signer directly to the SDK.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Web3Button](./react.web3button.md)                   | <p>**<i>(BETA)</i>** A component that allows the user to call an on-chain function on a contract.</p><p>The button has to be wrapped in a <code>Web3sdksProvider</code> in order to function.</p>                                                                                                                                                       |

| [TransferNFTParams](./react.transfernftparams.md)                   | **<i>(BETA)</i>** The params to pass to <code>useTransferNFT</code>.                                                                                        |
